閞字的基本解释

閞
biàn
门柱上的斗拱。

閞
guān
古同“关”。

閞字的汉语字典释义

[①]［guān］
［《廣韻》古還切，平删，見。］
“关1”的繁体字。亦作“閞1”。亦作“関1”。亦作“闗1”。亦作“1”。
(1)门闩。
(2)门；门扇。
(3)泛指门户、出入口。
(4)城门；要塞。
(5)特指函谷关或潼关。
(6)征税的关卡。
(7)关税。
(8)控制。
(9)僧尼与外界隔绝、静坐修行时所住的龛或房。
(10)使开着的物体合拢。
(11)处置；安排。
(12)禁闭；放在里面不使出来。
(13)（商店或工厂）歇业。
(14)比喻经受严峻考验的时刻。
(15)指境界。
(16)经过，通过。
(17)禀告。
(18)表白。
(19)犹纳入。
(20)古代官府之间行文询事或提取案犯。
(21)古代亦指平行官府之间往来的公文。
(22)索要；领取；发放。
(23)机器或物体中起转动关联作用的部分。
(24)引申为事物中最关紧要的部分，对情况起决定作用的因素。
(25)关联；涉及。
(26)牵系。
(2

閞字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【門字部】　閞； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1333第31
【唐韻】【集韻】?皮變切，音卞。【說文】門?櫨也。【爾雅·釋宮】閞謂之槉。【疏】閞者，柱上木名。又謂之槉。又名欂，亦名枅，柱上方木是也。　又【廣韻】符萬切【集韻】扶萬切，?音飯。義同。

閞字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
閞字的起名意思

暂无。

閞
Basic explanation of words
閞
biàn
The bucket arch on the doorpost.
閞
guān
Gu Tong "closed".
閞
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［guān］
["Guangyun" is still cut in ancient times, deleted flat, see. ]
Traditional characters for "关1". Also known as "閞1". Also known as "Off 1". Also known as "闗1". Also known as "1".
(1) Door latch.
(2) Door; door leaf.
(3) Broadly refers to portals, entrances and exits.
(4) City gate; fortress.
(5) Specifically refers to Hangu Pass or Tong Pass.
(6) Checkpoints for taxation.
(7) Tariff.
(8) Control.
(9) The niche or room where monks and nuns live in isolation from the outside world and sit in meditation practice.
(10) Close the open objects.
(11) Disposal; Arrangement.
(12) Confinement; put it inside without letting it out.
(13) (Shop or factory) closed.
(14) A metaphor for a moment of severe test.
(15) Refers to realm.
(16) Go through and pass.
(17) Report.
(18) Confession.
(19) Still included.
(20) Inquiring about matters or extracting criminals between ancient government and government.
(21) In ancient times, it also refers to official documents between parallel government offices.
(22) Ask for; receive; issue.
(23) The part of the machine or object that plays the role of rotation correlation.
(24) It is extended to be the most important part of things, which is the decisive factor of the situation.
(25) Associated; involved.
(26) Linkage.
(2

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Xu Ji 1] [Men Zi Department] 　閞; Kangxi strokes: 13; page number: page 1333 31
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? The skin changes and the sound is Bian. [Said the text] The door? 【Erya·Shigong】Xi said that it is Zhixuan. 【Sparse】Hier, the wooden name on the pillar. It's also called 槉. Also known as 欂, also known as 枅, the wood above the column is also.　[Guangyun] Fu Wanqie [Jiyun] Help Wanqie, sound rice. The same meaning.
